name: Foodipes: Food recipes Blog
description: A food blog with a number of simple and healthy recipes; and food blogging resources, where users can discover recipes, videos, and books from well-known chefs of the world.

name: Crypto Price Tracker
description: An android app that allows users to easily track the price of over 10,000 cryptocurrencies in real time

name: LMS
description: A Library Management System that allows users to keep track of a list of books in the Library

name: vizIOT
description: Dashboard for visualization of Trends in Multiple Network Attacks on IoT Devices

name: Disease Prediction System
description: A system to help people to figure out the disease they might have based on the symptoms in their bodies

name: Data Engineering Pipeline for Stock Market data analysis
description: Implemented a data pipeline using Python for Stock Market data analysis with help of Apache Kafka, Amazon S3, Glue and Athena.
